Question & Options:
What does Pacino express to Jill about his feelings for her?
Options:
A. He wants to marry her.
B. He cares about her but thinks other men deserve her more.
C. He is indifferent to her.
D. He wants to be just friends.
Correct Answer: He cares about her but thinks other men deserve her more.
